Information_1_3: ^Heed my warnings! We have forgotten our sacred oaths to the spirits of the forest!
^I don't have anything to ask you right now.

c-0: ^Why, the forest spirit! There is also Odin, and Loki, and Thor, and...
c-1: ^What do I do? I praise the spirits of course! I keep the town safe! I...

c-0: ^Well... if Odin were to command me...
^I guess that's not enough to accuse you of anything.

c-2: ^Hmm. Well I never did trust the Cattle Herder, Gro, much. And Harold seems to have it out for me. Though he seems to like children.
^The Cattle Herder, Gro. I'll have a talk with them.
